name: Vespero
description: Roasted chestnut, chocolate and raisin. Ruby hue and a hint of noble hops.

name: Lumina
description: Notes of apricot, pear and lemongrass.

name: Grandar
description: Crackery sweetness balanced with hops, floral and herbal notes that finish with a subtle citrus. Step mashed and hopped with nobles.

name: Glyphs II
description: Vibrant tropical fruit and citrus layers with a pillowy soft body.

name: Phokas
description: Tropical and citrusy with hints of pine and white grape. Light, juicy, and easy-drinking.

name: DDH Lupula
description: Double dry hopped Lupula. Notes of Pineapple, mango, and grapefruit. Aromatic.

name: DDH Akko
description: Double dry hopped variant of Akko. Pineapple and orange mango, bursting with peach ring candies.
hops: Mega Motueka, Nelson Sauvin™, Citra®, Galaxy®

name: Kamo
hops: Freestyle Southern Cross, Freestyle Riwaka™, Citra DynaBoost™, Citra®

name: Priscus II
description: Hop saturated variant. Sauvignon blanc, blueberry and citrus.

name: Sever
description:
Dark roast coffee and pumpkin pie in a rich quaffable stout. Conditioned freshly-roasted Brazilian coffee beans from Temper Coffee Roasters.
.
hops: Krush HyperBoost™, Citra® DynaBoost™, Riwaka™, Citra®

name: Faust
description: Unfiltered 2025 vintage. Slightly sour, dry and oaky. Aged 18 months in oak foeders on our house microflora and conditioned on plums.
